data.message:
OT:   Hi, can you tell me if this is legit?
Thank you.
Annette Sroga messaged me this.
Are you aware of the Facebook Freedom Lottery Promo?
i got $500,000 from them i thought you also known about it because i saw your name and your picture on the FedEx delivery 
list when they came to deliver my money to me and all the emails that surf on Facebook is been randomly selected by their
database machine so that the lucky winners can benefit from the profit they have made so far the fund raising is use to help eradicate poverty around the world as it started in their delivery document, they make use of Facebook website because is the
most social networking commonly use around the world. Get back to me to get your claims now!!!

replies.message: Hey Carrie, this sounds like a hoax message. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1fTr2lt. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Kelsey

Hello Facebook  We are a company from music,The name of our company from music this is InternationalMusicT1,Our company and created by kevin salgueiro godinho,The Company created the august 18 2009 our company published from the music on YouTube is also on Dailymotion.Us would become partner with your company Facebook.
I think I did it right, used my cell phone, instead of laptop.
